errors.banned: You're banned from using this website.
errors.not_verified: Your email address is not verified. Sign up to get the verification link again.

messages.password_changed: Your password has been changed successfully.

email.verify_greeting: Thanks for creating an account on {{domain}}.
email.verify_text: Please verify your email address using the link below.
email.reset_text: A password reset has been requested for your account.
email.reset_instruction: Please click on the button below to reset your password. There's no need to take any action if you didn't request this.
email.change_email_text: A request has been made to change your email address.
email.change_email_verify_text: Please verify your new email address using the link below.

settings.api_description: In additional to this website, you can use the API to create, delete and get shortened URLs. If you're not familiar with API, don't generate the key. DO NOT share this key on the client side of your website.
settings.custom_domain_description: You can set a custom domain for your short URLs, so instead of {{default_domain}}/shorturl you can have yoursite.com/shorturl.
settings.point_domain_cname: Point your domain's A record to
settings.point_domain_a: Point your domain's A record to
settings.or_cname_to: or your subdomain's CNAME record to
settings.cloudflare_note: If you're using Cloudflare, make sure to use DNS only mode for your subdomain.
settings.then_add_domain_form: Then, add the domain via the form below:
settings.homepage_redirect_note: If you leave homepage empty, yoursite.com will be redirected to {{default_domain}}.
settings.delete_domain_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the domain "{{address}}"?
settings.change_email_description: Enter your password and a new email address to change your email address.
settings.change_password_description: Enter your current password and a new password to change it to.

layout.og_description: Free & Open Source Modern URL Shortener
layout.meta_description: {{site_name}} is a free and open source URL shortener with custom domains and stats.

pages.banned_title: Link has been banned and removed because of malware or scam.
pages.banned_report: If you noticed a malware/scam link shortened by {{domain}}, send us a report.
pages.verified: Your account has been verified. Redirecting to homepage...
pages.reset_password_forgot: If you forgot you password you can use the form below to get a reset password link.
pages.report_text: Report abuses, malware and phishing links to the email address below or use the form. We will review as soon as we can.
pages.delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
pages.enter_password: Enter the password to be redirected to the link.
pages.custom_domain_text: You can set a custom domain for your short URLs, so instead of {{default_domain}}/shorturl you can have your domain.
pages.domain_a_record: Point your domain's A record to
pages.domain_cname_record: or your subdomain's CNAME record to
pages.domain_cloudflare: If you're using Cloudflare, make sure to use DNS only mode for your subdomain.
pages.domain_add_form: Then, add the domain via the form below:
pages.domain_homepage_note: If you leave homepage empty, yoursite.com will be redirected to {{default_domain}}.
pages.api_docs_text: In additional to this website, you can use the API to create, delete and get shortened URLs. If you're not familiar with API, don't generate the key. DO NOT share this key on the client side of your website.
pages.change_password_text: Enter your current password and a new password to change it to.
pages.change_email_text: Enter your password and a new email address to change your email address.
